Q.1. Which of the following institutes developed an electrochemical sensing platform to detect carcinogenic or mutagenic compound N-nitrosodimethylamine and N-nitrosodiethanolamine?
(A) Institute of Advanced Study in Science and Technology
(C) Centre for Nano and Soft Matter Sciences

Q.2. State-owned Ircon International Limited has signed a MoU with which company to explore opportunities for joint development of railways and other infrastructure projects in Asia, Africa and Latin America?
Q.3. The World Bank announced emergency operations of how much worth to 100 developing countries over a 15-month period to fight the deadly Coronavirus?
Q.4. International Day for Biological Diversity is celebrated every year on which date?
Q.5. A rare palm of South Andaman Island 'Pinanga andamanensis' will be grown in which state with the help of Jawaharlal Nehru Tropical Botanic Garden and Research Institute?
Q.6. Which of the following institutes has developed a cup-shaped design mask that helps to create enough space in front of the mouth while speaking to tackle COVID-19?
(A) Translational Health Science and Technology Institute
(B) Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology
(C) Centre for Nano and Soft Matter Sciences

Q.7. The Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) has announced that it is to replace hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) with which tea to improve immunity and possibly reduce viral replication, in the revised protocol?
Q.8. International Day to End Obstetric Fistula is observed on which date?
Q.9. Dr. Harsh Vardhan participated in the Non-Aligned Movement Health Ministers meeting through video conference. When was NAM established?
Q.10. Which of the following institutes developed 'Parabolic Trough Collector', a new trough collector equipped with enhanced energy to serve industries?
(A) Translational Health Science and Technology Institute
(C) Centre for Nano and Soft Matter Sciences
Q.11. What was the theme of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises E-conclave, "Society of Indian Defence Manufacturers MSME Conclave 2020"?
(A) Business Continuity for MSMEs in Defence Sector
(B) Business Continuity for MSMEs in Service Sector
(C) Business Continuity for MSMEs in Manufacturing Sector
(D) Business Continuity for MSMEs in Defence & Aerospace Sector
Q.12. The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has released its Monetary Policy Statement 2020-21 in Mumbai , Maharashtra. Who is Governer of RBI?
Q.13. Government has notified the amendments to the General Financial Rules(GFR) 2017 that the global tenders will be banned for government procurement upto how much worth?
Q.14. The United Nations has listed which state's initiative "khudol" among the top 10 global initiatives for an inclusive fight against the COVID-19 pandemic?
Q.15. Which institute has mapped two alternative dwarf genes - Rht14 and Rht18- in wheat that can eliminate rice crop residue burning?
(A) Institute of Advanced Study in Science and Technology
(C) Centre for Nano and Soft Matter Sciences
Q.16. Which company acquired a 10% strategic stake in Voicezen, a Gurgaon based startup in early stage focused on conversational AI technologies?

Q.17. The Textiles Committee, Mumbai was named as the ninth approved laboratory to test and certify PPE body coveralls produced in the country for healthcare workers. Who is current Union Textile Minister?
Q.18. Who has been appointed by the World Bank to a key position on climate change and disaster management in South Asia?
Q.19. If ADVANCE is coded as CEWCXMG, then what will be code for BRITAIN?
Q.20. IRDAI has approved the proposal of which bank to continue with its 30% holding in IndiaFirst Life?
Q.21. UNICEF partnered with which company to support the school children in the coronavirus affected areas and provide them access to remote learning in africa?
